tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clothing_inventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    item_description TEXT,
    item_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    in_stock BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE DesignerClothingInventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE AccessoriesInventory (
    accessory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE show_inventory (
  show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_id INT NOT NULL,
  clothing_id INT NOT NULL,
  accessory_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designer(designer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (clothing_id) REFERENCES clothing(clothing_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (accessory_id) REFERENCES accessories(accessory_id)
);

CREATE TABLE designer_clothing (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_inventory (
    item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    size VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    color VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    designer_id INT REFERENCES designer_clothing (id)
);

CREATE TABLE accessory_inventory (
    accessory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    color VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    designer_id INT REFERENCES designer_clothing (id)
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_show (
    show_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    show_date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    theme VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    lead_designer_id INT REFERENCES designer_clothing (id)
);
